title: I Love You 64 Times - 64 Volte Ti Amo: Love Poetry Italian English Text
description: Bilingual edition Italian - English text“I wrote passionate love poems for you to put me in your hands daring eternity...”How great is Love? It does not have any boundaries that define it and time does not limit it. Eight times eight, infinity multiplied, seems just the right size to describe Love and its immeasurable nature.
author: Giulietta Esthel
